posts_data.title: Commissioned: Mizmor presents Wit's End
posts_data.content:
This great interview with Mizmor’s A.L.N. by Cody F Davis does more justice than we could ever hope to when it comes to explaining what this incredible track is all about. With Mizmor, there’s almost always another layer to peel back and explore and Wit’s End is no difference. Words can’t express how lucky we feel to be presenting this piece of music to you.

Wit’s End was written, performed, produced, recorded, and mixed by A.L.N., mastered by Adam Gonsalves and has an accompanying video by Zev Deans.

Wit's End is the title track off an upcoming Mizmor EP coming to Gilead Media later this year. Click here to find out more/support Mizmor.

posts_data.title: Haunted Plasma - coming up soon!
posts_data.content:
If you missed our excited posts about it in advance, Haunted Plasma is a power-house of futuristic synth in symbiosis with the super violence of kosmische black metal. The phantoms at the beating nucleus of this unearthly machine are Juho Vanhanen (Oranssi Pazuzu, Grave Pleasures), Timo Kaukolampi (K-X-P, Op:l Bastards) and Tomi Leppänen (CIRCLE, Aavikko, K-X-P), transmitting a music form evolved from a life of redefining sonic boundaries in their respective projects. Also featuring guest vocals from Mat McNerney (Hexvessel, Carpenter Brut, Beast Milk) and Ringa Manner (Ruusut, The Hearing).

If we were together in Tilburg today - THIS would be the set that everyone in the Weirdo Canyon was getting hyped for.

posts_data.title: Commissioned: BADA
posts_data.content:
Anna Von Hausswolff is full of surprises. Despite our love for her output we weren’t quite prepared for how she dominated the Main Stage in 2019… and now, with her band, BADA, we weren’t sure what to expect from this commissioned performance. If sprawling, psychedelic jams are your thing then these guys have delivered just the thing to get your Saturday evening heading in some kind of spacey direction. Hit play and prepare to be transported somewhere altogether more diaphanous.

Click here for bonus BADA.

posts_data.title: Roadburn Deep Dive - Wolves In The Throne Room
posts_data.content:
“It was a formative time for Wolves In The Throne Room and also for Roadburn"

José Carlos Santos caught up with Aaron Weaver and took him on a deep dive into Wolves In The Throne Room's formidable Roadburn debut, way back in 2008.

posts_data.title: Offermose presents Jordens åbne sår
posts_data.content:
Craving tidal waves of shape shifting sounds that open wide the hidden portal of the mind and the twisted trails to the distant light within thyself? Look no further - from the bottomless depths of murky forest lakes to the unfathomable reaches of primordial cosmos, Offermose have arrived with yet another dark ritual of sacrifice, this time exclusively for Roadburn Redux.

Keep Offermose here.
